title: Why Tour de France Record Smashing Climbing Times May Not Be as Surprising as They Appear
content:
New climbing records by the Tour’s two superstars Tadej Pogačar and Jonas Vingegaard are raising questions — but the reality of cycling is much different today than a quarter century ago.

Read the full article at Why Tour de France Record Smashing Climbing Times May Not Be as Surprising as They Appear on Velo.
author: sstokes
